channel.title: Compiler Problem
channel.description:
Here's my compiler:
@echo off color 0c title FireScape Compiler "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/javac" *.java pause
Here's my Enviroment Variables (I think it's got something to do with this.):
[b]CLASSPATH[/b] - [b]CLASSPATH=C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/;%CLASSPATH%;.[/b] [b]Path[/b] - [b]C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/[/b]
I have the most up-to-date JDK yet I can't compile my server because it tells me:
The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
If possible, could someone with a working compiler, up-to-date JDK and correctly working Enviroment Variables C&P it all here so I may see if it works AND tell me what was wrong because I did a bit of fiddling around with it and seemingly balls'd it up... Oh and don't tell me to just edit in the Perfect Compiler by Mod T. because I know it won't work. :)

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @Pkgem Pkgem
item.description:
@Pkgem wrote:

Update 2 I believe.

Edit: I got it working. I changed the _01 in the compiler to _02 (update 2) and it now compiles perfectly!

Thanks for your help, VB7 Rocks.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Pkgem, post:5, topic:140561”]No it did not work. Is a restart required after making changed to your Enviromental Variables?

Got any other ideas?[/quote]

Are you running the Update 1 or Update 2 of JDK 6?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @Pkgem Pkgem
item.description:
@Pkgem wrote:

No it did not work, thanks for trying. Is a restart required after making changes to your Enviromental Variables?

Got any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Pkgem:

Compiler or Variables?

In this part:

[quote=“Pkgem, post:1, topic:140561”]Here’s my compiler:

[quote]
@echo off
color 0c
title FireScape Compiler
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/javac” *.java
pause
[/quote][/quote]

Replace it with

@echo off
color 0c
title FireScape Compiler
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/javac.exe" *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

It’s “C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_01/bin/javac.exe”

You forgot the .exe at the end.

Read full topic
